description.raw:
There were several comment threads not addressed in pull request #5 that are addressed here:

full comment threads from pr #5: #!/osrf/sdf_tutorials/pull-requests/5/pose-frame-semantics-describe-legacy/activity#

preview: http://sdformat.org/tutorials?branch=legacy_pose_frame_followup

* fix invalid link

* add URDF comments near <origin> snippets

* add inline comments to examples of valid and invalid naming

* recommend not to use world as a link name

* add more inline comments about valid and invalid examples

* combine TODO into note about future discussions

* scope suffix notation to kinematic quantities since inertial quantities are more complicated

* refer to specify_pose tutorial before using fancy notation

* fix typo

* use relative /tutorials in links instead of full URL to allow for local hosting

* use relative URL to link to tutorial
